name: planted.schnitzel
description: Crispy golden-brown breading with tender, chicken-like texture. The classic schnitzel experience.
longDescription: Bring back Sunday dinners with our planted.schnitzel Wiener Art. With its perfectly crispy golden-brown coating and tender, juicy interior, it delivers everything you love about a traditional schnitzel. Serve with a squeeze of lemon and your favorite sides for a meal that satisfies.
ingredients: Water, pea protein (20%), wheat flour, breadcrumbs, rapeseed oil, pea fiber, natural flavoring, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Pan-fry in oil for 3-4 minutes on each side until golden and crispy. Serve with lemon wedges, potato salad, and lingonberry jam.

steps.title: Heat
steps.description: Generous oil in pan. Get it properly hot.

steps.title: Serve
steps.description: Classic style: lemon, potato salad, lingonberries.
